title: Picnic on Paradise
description: Suspended in the jade depths of an ancient Earth sea. Chrono-hurled to a steep winter planet swept by an eerie future war. Middle-aged (at 26), tiger-tough (at 4'9"), walking a wild Universe on Time-long legs. This is the story of a woman named Alyx.cover of this edition from Christos "Chris" Achilleos
author: Joanna Russ
